traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Lawful
traits.text: Lawful effects often manipulate energy from law-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to chaotic divine servants or divine servants of chaotic deities. A creature with this trait is lawful in alignment.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Medium
traits.text: *Space:* 5 feet, *Reach (Tall):* 5 feet, *Reach (Long):* 5 feet

traits.name: Fiend
traits.text: Creatures that hail from or have a strong connection to the evil-aligned planes are called fiends. Fiends can survive the basic environmental effects of planes in the Outer Sphere.

traits.name: Velstrac
traits.text: A family of fiends from the Shadow Plane that are associated with pain and agony. All velstracs possess some form of disturbing gaze.

modifiers.name: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

automatic_abilities.name: Final Spite
automatic_abilities.trigger: Sonnorae is reduced to 0 Hit Points
automatic_abilities.effect: Sonnorae casts *wail of the banshee*, if it's available, before dying. Otherwise, she makes one Strike.

automatic_abilities.name: Unnerving Gaze

traits.name: Aura
traits.text: An aura is an emanation that continually ebbs out from you, affecting creatures within a certain radius. Aura can also refer to the magical signature of an item or a creature with a strong alignment.

traits.name: Divine
traits.text: This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Enchantment
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the enchantment school of magic, typically involving mind control, emotion alteration, and other mental effects.

traits.name: Mental
traits.text: A mental effect can alter the target's mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.

traits.name: Visual
traits.text: A visual effect can affect only creatures that can see it. This applies only to visible parts of the effect, as determined by the GM.

automatic_abilities.text: When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it must succeed at a DC 37 Will save or become doomed 1.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Finesse
traits.text: You can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls using this melee weapon. You still use your Strength modifier when calculating damage.

traits.name: Reach
traits.text: Natural attacks with this trait can be used to attack creatures up to the listed distance away instead of only adjacent creatures. Weapons with this trait are long and can be used to attack creatures up to 10 feet away instead of only adjacent creatures. For creatures that already have reach with the limb or limbs that wield the weapon, the weapon increases their reach by 5 feet.

spells.name: plane shift
spells.count_text: at will; to the Harrowed Realm; Material Plane; or Shadow Plane only

ability.name: Assemble Choir
ability.text: Sonnorae adds a creature that is affected by her Spirit-Flensing Touch and is within 100 feet to her choir of screams. Sonnorae can have any number of creatures in her choir, although a creature no longer affected by Spirit-Flensing Touch leaves the choir immediately. Creatures in Sonnorae's choir of screams are fascinated by each other and Sonnorae, and they can't use hostile actions toward each other or Sonnorae. If Sonnorae uses a hostile action toward a creature in her choir, it immediately leaves the choir. When Sonnorae casts an innate divine spell, she can cause the effect to originate from any member of her choir instead of herself, using her saving throw DC and attack bonus.

ability.name: Focus Gaze

traits.name: Concentrate
traits.text: An action with this trait requires a degree of mental concentration and discipline.

traits.name: Divine
traits.text: This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Enchantment
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the enchantment school of magic, typically involving mind control, emotion alteration, and other mental effects.

traits.name: Mental
traits.text: A mental effect can alter the target's mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.

traits.name: Visual
traits.text: A visual effect can affect only creatures that can see it. This applies only to visible parts of the effect, as determined by the GM.

ability.text: Sonnorae stares at a creature she can see within 30 feet. The target must attempt a Will save against Sonnorae's unnerving gaze. In addition, if the creature was already doomed, on a failed save, it sees the skin of its body peel back, making it confused for as long as it remains doomed. After attempting this save, the creature is then temporarily immune until the start of Sonnorae's next turn.

ability.name: Spirit-Flensing Touch

traits.name: Divine
traits.text: This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Mental
traits.text: A mental effect can alter the target's mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.

traits.name: Necromancy
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the necromancy school of magic, typically involving forces of life and death.

ability.critical_success: The creature is unaffected, and is temporarily immune for 24 hours.
ability.failure: The creature takes 9d6 damage and is sickened 1 and stupefied 1. As long as the creature remains sickened, it must use one action on its turn to scream in agony.
ability.critical_failure: The creature takes 18d6 damage and is sickened 2 and stupefied 2. As long as the creature remains sickened, it must use two actions on its turn to scream in agony.
ability.text: Sonnorae touches a creature within 10 feet. The target's spirit tears through its organs and flesh and must attempt a DC 40 Will save.
